A4.text: Roosevelt took office as vice president in March 1901.

A5.text: He assumed the presidency after McKinley's assassination in 1901.

A6.text: Roosevelt was sworn into office on September 14, 1901.

A7.text: Roosevelt took office upon the assassination of President William McKinley.
